title: Anntenna Schema extension for SigMF-meta file.
description: The `antenna` namespace extension defines static antenna parameters extending the `global` and `annotations` objects in SigMF Recordings, and the `collection` object in a SigMF Collection.

global.description: The following names are specified in the `antenna` namespace and should be used in the `global` object:

antenna:model.description: Antenna make and model number. E.g. ARA CSB-16, L-com HG3512UP-NF.

antenna:type.description: Antenna type. E.g. dipole, biconical, monopole, conical monopole

antenna:low_frequency.description: Low frequency of operational range, in Hz.

antenna:high_frequency.description: High frequency of operational range, in Hz.

antenna:gain.description: Antenna gain in direction of maximum radiation or reception, in units of dBi.

antenna:horizontal_gain_pattern.description: Antenna gain pattern in horizontal plane from 0 to 359 degrees in 1 degree steps, in units of dBi.

antenna:vertical_gain_pattern.description: Antenna gain pattern in vertical plane from -90 to +90 degrees in 1 degree steps, in units of dBi.

antenna:voltage_standing_wave_ratio.description: Voltage standing wave ratio, in units of volts.

antenna:cable_loss.description: Cable loss for cable connecting antenna and preselector, in dB.

antenna:steerable.description: Defines if the antenna is steerable or not.

antenna:mobile.description: Defines if the antenna is mobile or not.

antenna:hagl.description: Antenna phase center height above ground level, in meters.

annotations.description: The following names are specified in the `antenna` namespace and should be used in the `annotations` object:

antenna:azimuth_angle.description: Angle of main beam in azimuthal plane from North, in degrees.

antenna:elevation_angle.description: Angle of main beam in elevation plane from horizontal, in degrees.

collection.description: The following fields are specificed in SigMF Collections:

antenna:azimuth_angle.description: Angle of main beam in azimuthal plane from North, in degrees.

antenna:elevation_angle.description: Angle of main beam in elevation plane from horizontal, in degrees.

antenna:hagl.description: Nominal antenna phase center height above ground level, in meters.
